DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About the Package ============================== Office 365 is a line of subscription services offered by Microsoft as part of the Microsoft Office product line. The brand encompasses plans that allow the use of the Microsoft Office software suite over the life of the subscription, as well as cloud-based software as a service products for business environments, such as hosted Exchange Server, among others. This Package allows you to manage the mailboxes and groups with features like Create/Update/Remove Mailbox, Create/Update/Remove Group.
=Setup= * This Package supports Exchange Online. * Java 1.8 executable or higher version should be installed and set in the PATH environment variable. * Powershell 4.0 or later * This Package supports Windows Agent only.
=Variables= (None)
=Common Inputs= -- Office365 connection Details -- * URL* Provide the Office365 connection URL. * Username* Provide Username to authenticate. * Password* Provide Password to authenticate.
=Actions= The following actions are supported.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action creates a new mailbox in Microsoft Exchange.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_SHARED_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action creates a new shared mailbox in Microsoft Exchange.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.UPDATE_MAILBOX * Action Description : This Action updates a mailbox or shared mailbox.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action deletes a mailbox or a shared mailbox.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.ADD_PERMISSIONS_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action adds single or multiple permissions on a mailbox or shared mailbox in Microsoft Exchange.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.REMOVE_PERMISSIONS_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action removes single or multiple permissions on a mailbox or shared mailbox in Microsoft Exchange.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_GROUP * Action Description : This action creates a new group.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.UPDATE_GROUP * Action Description : This action updates a group.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_GROUP * Action Description : This action deletes the group.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.ADD_MEMBERS_TO_GROUP * Action Description : This action adds the members to the group.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_MEMBERS_FROM_GROUP * Action Description : This action deletes the members from the group
